Job.Title: Cobbler
Job.Description: She will make shoes and leather items.

LoseTrait.Text: It took her ruining hundreds of leather items, and just as many reprimands, but ${name} has finally stopped being so Clumsy.

GainTrait.Text: Regular work with leather items has turned ${name} into a capable Handyman.

Message.Name: work
Message.Text: ${name} worked making shoes and other leather items at the arena.

Message.Text: ${name} refused to work as a cobbler during the ${shift} shift.
